results.content: Nice course to understand simple react logic using latest syntax. I would recommend to skip all the bootstrap based CSS part. Nevertheless you will find some great simple recommendations to use ant-design library for specific UI components. Please note that this specific course does not include learning about securing your connections, private routes , context, commissions and partner accounts transfer with Stripe.

results.content: The course is good for beginner.
